purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 彷)
Pictophonetic: 方 indicates the sound; 亻 (to imitate a person) conveys the meaning.

仿真 [ fǎng zhēn ]: to emulate; to simulate; emulation; simulation

效仿 [ xiào fǎng ]: see 仿效

humanum_full_description_en:
From " person " to " fang " sound. The text from the " person ", " C " sound. The original meaning means similar. "Said Wen": "Imitate, similar. From people, Fang Sheng. 㑂, Imitate from C." " Imitate " is often used in conjunction with " Buddha " as "as if", and also as "as if" and "as if", It seems, it seems. Such as "Historical Records. The Biographies of Sima Xiangru: "It seems like a god." Tao Yuanming of the Eastern Jin Dynasty "Peach Blossom Spring": "The mountain has a small mouth, as if there is light." See " Buddha ", " Buddha ".

" Fake " is also used in conjunction with " fee " as "fake" to indicate the appearance of wandering and wandering. "Guang Ya. Shixun: "Imitate the pretence, move and rely on it." Such as "Chu Ci. "Farward Travel": "Looking like a feint and happy, never succeeding forever." "Huainanzi. "Spirit": "Guangran imitates dust and dirt, and swayed in nothingness."

" Imitation " extended representation to follow, emulate, and " efficient communication." For example, Han Yu in the Tang Dynasty "On the Buddha's Bone Table": "Burn the top and burn the fingers, the hundred and ten are in a group, and the clothes are scattered and the money is scattered. From the dynasty to the twilight, the phase will imitate, lest the time will come." "Old Tang Book. "Xuanzong Benji": "Since modern times, there has been a common practice of extravagance, imitating each other, and immersing in a custom, which has exhausted family possessions and even withered."
humanum_short_description_en: From " person " to " fang " sound. The original meaning means similar.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「方」聲。籀文從「人」，「丙」聲。本義指相似。《說文》：「仿，相似也。从人，方聲。㑂，籀文仿从丙。」「仿」多與「佛」連用作「仿佛」，又作「彷彿」、「髣髴」，表示好像、似乎。如《史記．司馬相如列傳》：「縹乎忽忽，若神仙之仿佛。」東晉陶淵明〈桃花源記〉：「山有小口，仿佛若有光。」參見「佛」、「彿」。

　　「仿」又與「佯」連用作「仿佯」，表示徘徊、游蕩的樣子。《廣雅．釋訓》：「仿佯，徙倚也。」如《楚辭．遠遊》：「聊仿佯而逍遙兮，永歷年而無成。」《淮南子．精神》：「芒然仿佯于塵垢之外，而消搖于無事之業。」

　　「仿」引申表示效法、仿效，與「傚」相通。如唐代韓愈〈論佛骨表〉：「焚頂燒指，百十為群，解衣散錢，自朝至暮，轉相仿效，惟恐後時。」《舊唐書．玄宗本紀》：「近代以來，共行奢靡，遞相仿效，浸成風俗，既竭家產，多至凋弊。」
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
仿 (Trad.: 彷)
Pinyin: fǎng
English Definition: to imitate; to copy; seemingly
Total strokes: 6; Radical: 人
Pictophonetic: 方 indicates the sound; 亻 (to imitate a person) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 方 [ fāng ] square, rectangle; side; region; flag
Step by Step Stroke Sequence: Download Customize Pin it
Example Words:
仿佛 [ fǎng fú ]: to seem; as if; alike; similar
模仿 [ mó fǎng ]: to imitate; to copy; to emulate; to mimic; model
仿真 [ fǎng zhēn ]: to emulate; to simulate; emulation; simulation
仿效 [ fǎng xiào ]: to copy; to imitate
效仿 [ xiào fǎng ]: see 仿效
More: 仿* | *仿 | *仿*

倣倣RS
仿仿 		imitate
  • person going in a certain direction 放/方 of another person 亻: he's imitating
(Trad.: 彷)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 方 indicates the sound; 亻 (to imitate a person) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 方 [ fāng ] square, rectangle; side; region; flag
①效法，照样做：仿效。仿古。仿冒。仿宋(印刷字体的一种，亦称“仿宋体”)。
②依照范本写的字：仿影。仿书。
③相似，好像：仿像(仿佛相似)。仿佛。二者相仿。
仿佛 [ fǎng fú ]: to seem; as if; alike; similar
仿真 [ fǎng zhēn ]: to emulate; to simulate; emulation; simulation
仿效 [ fǎng xiào ]: to copy; to imitate
(Trad.: 彷)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 方 indicates the sound; 亻 (to imitate a person) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 5
Freq: 1259
Chinese: Mr. T doesn't mimic the direction of the crowd.  
Meaning: mimic
Hanzi: 㑂
Story: Mr. T doesn't mimic the direction of the crowd.   He goes his own way.  

從「 人 」，「 方 」聲。籀文從「 人 」，「 丙 」聲。本義指相似。《說文》：「仿，相似也。从人，方聲。㑂，籀文仿从丙。」「 仿 」多與「 佛 」連用作「仿佛」，又作「彷彿」、「髣髴」，表示好像、似乎。如《史記．司馬相如列傳》：「縹乎忽忽，若神仙之仿佛。」東晉陶淵明〈桃花源記〉：「山有小口，仿佛若有光。」參見「 佛 」、「 彿 」。 「 仿 」又與「 佯 」連用作「仿佯」，表示徘徊、游蕩的樣子。《廣雅．釋訓》：「仿佯，徙倚也。」如《楚辭．遠遊》：「聊仿佯而逍遙兮，永歷年而無成。」《淮南子．精神》：「芒然仿佯于塵垢之外，而消搖于無事之業。」 「 仿 」引申表示效法、仿效，與「 傚 」相通。如唐代韓愈〈論佛骨表〉：「焚頂燒指，百十為群，解衣散錢，自朝至暮，轉相仿效，惟恐後時。」《舊唐書．玄宗本紀》：「近代以來，共行奢靡，遞相仿效，浸成風俗，既竭家產，多至凋弊。」
From " person" to " fang" sound. The text from the " person", " C" sound. The original meaning means similar. "Said Wen": "Imitate, similar. From people, Fang Sheng. 㑂, Imitate from C." " Imitate" is often used in conjunction with " Buddha" as "as if", and also as "as if" and "as if", It seems, it seems. Such as "Historical Records. The Biographies of Sima Xiangru: "It seems like a god." Tao Yuanming of the Eastern Jin Dynasty "Peach Blossom Spring": "The mountain has a small mouth, as if there is light." See " Buddha", " Buddha". " Fake" is also used in conjunction with " fee" as "fake" to indicate the appearance of wandering and wandering. "Guang Ya. Shixun: "Imitate the pretence, move and rely on it." Such as "Chu Ci. "Farward Travel": "Looking like a feint and happy, never succeeding forever." "Huainanzi. "Spirit": "Guangran imitates dust and dirt, and swayed in nothingness." " Imitation" extended representation to follow, emulate, and " efficient communication." For example, Han Yu in the Tang Dynasty "On the Buddha's Bone Table": "Burn the top and burn the fingers, the hundred and ten are in a group, and the clothes are scattered and the money is scattered. From the dynasty to the twilight, the phase will imitate, lest the time will come." "Old Tang Book. "Xuanzong Benji": "Since modern times, there has been a common practice of extravagance, imitating each other, and immersing in a custom, which has exhausted family possessions and even withered."

仿字的基本解释

仿
fǎng
效法，照样做：仿效。仿古。仿冒。仿宋（印刷字体的一种，亦称“仿宋体”）。
依照范本写的字：仿影。仿书。
相似，好像：仿像（仿佛相似）。仿佛（f?）。二者相仿。

仿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fǎng］
［《廣韻》妃兩切，上養，敷。］
(1)相似。
(2)比拟；模仿。
[②]［páng］
［《集韻》符方切，平陽，奉。］
［《洪武正韻》蒲光切，平陽］
(1)见“仿2佯”、“仿2洋”。
(2)见“仿2偟”。

仿字的英文翻译

◎ 仿
copy, imitate, resemble

仿字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　仿； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页95第02
【集韻】符方切，同彷。仿偟猶徘徊。亦作方皇。【史記·荆軻傳】仿偟不能去。　又【集韻】【韻會】撫兩切【正韻】妃兩切，?方上聲。仿佛，見不審貌。【揚雄·甘泉賦】仿佛其若夢。別作彷彿，髣髴，方弗，放弗，㑂佛，放?，怳歘，音義?同。

仿字的源字形

仿字的起名意思

：本义为相似，也有效法、照样做的含义。

Imitate
Basic explanation of words
Imitate
fǎng
Follow the example and do the same: follow the example. Antique. Counterfeit. Imitation Song (a type of printed font, also known as "Imitated Song Ti").
According to the word written in the template: imitation. Imitation book.
Similar, as if: simulacrum (as if similar). As if (f?). The two are similar.
Imitate
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fǎng］
["Guangyun" concubine cuts in two, raised and applied on top. ]
(1) Similar.
(2) Comparison; imitation.
[②]［páng］
["Ji Yun" Fu Fangqie, Pingyang, Feng. ]
["Hongwu Zhengyun" Pu Guangqie, Pingyang]
(1) See "Imitate 2 Fekes" and "Imitate 2 Foreigns".
(2) See "Imitation 2 偟".
Imitate
English translation of words
◎ Imitation
copy, imitate, resemble
Imitate
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [The Department of Human Characters] 　 Imitation; Kangxi Strokes: 6; Page Number: Page 95 02
【Ji Yun】Fu Fangqie, the same imitate. The imitation is still hovering. Also known as Fanghuang. [Historical Records·Jing Ke Biography] Fang Yan cannot go.　 [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Caress the two cuts [Zheng Yun] The concubine cuts in two cuts,? Fang Shangsheng. It seems that I don't look at it. 【Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu】It seems like a dream. Don't make it as if, as if, Fangfu, Fangfu, 㑂Buddha, Fang?, 恍歘, the sound and meaning are the same.
Imitate
Source glyph
Imitate
Name meaning
: The original meaning is similar, effective method, and the same.
形声字。人(イ)表意,表示人所见相似;方(fang )表声,方有并列义,表示并列者多相仿。本义是相似。
①类似;像:~佛|年龄相~。2模仿;效法:~造|~效。
3依照范本写的字:写了一张~。
~办 ~单 ~古 ~冒 ~若 ~宋 ~行~影
~照 ~纸 ~制 碘~ 模~ 摹~ 相~ 效~
仿
făng
,而。
防仿仿
Пиктофонетические символы.
Люди (イ) выражают значение, что означает, что то, что люди видят, похоже; клык (fang) выражает звук, а квадрат имеет параллельное значение, что означает, что те, кто параллельны, более похожи.
Исходное значение аналогично.
①Подобный; как: ~ Будда | Возраст ~.
2 имитировать; имитировать: ~ создать | ~ эффект.
3 По словам, написанным в шаблоне: Я написал кусок ~.
~ До ~ сингл ~ древний ~ дубль ~ если ~ песня ~ линия ~ тень ~ фото ~ бумага ~ йод ~ плесень ~ копия ~ фаза ~ эффект ~
Подражать
făng
,а также.
Защита от подделок
fǎng
1) подражать (чему-л.); имитировать
仿宋朝的字 подражать стилю письма сунской эпохи
2) имитация, подражание, уподобление; пропись
写了一张仿 написать лист прописей
3) см. 仿佛
